author: Oscar Wilde
message: The aim of life is self-development. To realize ones nature perfectly that is what each of us is here for.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anatole France
message: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
title: Thought of the day

author: Thomas Edison
message: The first requisite for success is the ability to apply your physical and mental energies to one problem incessantly without growing weary.
title: Thought of the day

author: John Steinbeck
message: If we could learn to like ourselves, even a little, maybe our cruelties and angers might melt away.
title: Thought of the day
